title: Crypto-based offerings to boost adoption of digital assets in PHL
description: INCREASED cryptocurrency-based offerings by Philippine financial institutions could drive growth in Filipinos’ adoption of digital assets, the top official of a global blockchain and Web3 software company said. “Increased access to regulated crypto investment options — similar to spot Bitcoin ETFs (exchange-traded funds) in the US — could attract more Filipino investors who are hesitant […]
